description: Example L5 Meta-Reflective Cohesion (MRC) report demonstrating cross-layer alignment, rupture detection, and repair strategy generation.

interpretation.cohesion_meaning: Overall system cohesion is strong at 76%. All layers are working together effectively.

interpretation.repair_status: No repair strategies needed. System is in healthy state.
